titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I celebrated in S. Margaret's at 8 a.m.
I attended a meeting at Sion College, when Wace read a paper on "The Trustworthiness of the Bible". In the discussion that followed I made a short speech.
My wife & I attended an "At home" at the Sub. Dean's.
